snippet: China's services sector grew at its slowest pace in almost 2-1/2 years in January after firms secured a smaller volume of new business, a private survey showed, adding to growing signs of slackening in the Chinese economy....

headline.print_headline: China's Jan HSBC Services PMI Falls to 50.7, Lowest in 2.5 Years
headline.main: China's Jan HSBC Services PMI Falls to 50.7, Lowest in 2.5 Years

lead_paragraph: China's services sector grew at its slowest pace in almost 2-1/2 years in January after firms secured a smaller volume of new business, a private survey showed, adding to growing signs of slackening in the Chinese economy.
